name: I'm a love interest in my CHILDHOOD FRIEND's Halloween story
name_original: I'm a love interest in my CHILDHOOD FRIEND's Halloween story
description:
Celebrate Halloween with the main cast of 'I'm a love interest in my CHILDHOOD FRIEND'S reverse harem!!!' in this Spooktober game jam special.

Features:
- Halloween themed art and graphics
- Mini-games
- Spooky tunes by Kinetik Lee
- Two endings
- COSTUMES

Warning: Game features a character that swears.

Special thanks to our Patreon supporters:
Dia
David
Sasha The Lemon
Their patronage allows me to support CC content creators like Kinetik Lee.
